channel.title: System Settings on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in System Settings on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: Input Source
item.description: The input source controls which port is displayed in the secondary view. To set the secondary input source, click Input Source. NOTE: No other sources are available for systems with a connected Analysis System.

item.title: Monitor
item.description: The monitor system settings have adjustable settings for displays connected to the system. To access Monitor options, click Monitor. 1 Monitor drop-down menu – Selects a display. 2 Primary Monitor toggle switch – Sets the selected display to the primary display. Only use the provided monitor as the primary monitor. 3 View drop-down menu – Sets the content on the screen. Select one of the following: Control - Displays the user interface and system camera image.
